Text: wtf is this. Im downloading to find out.

Shellbox. I have been visited by the police to drop this. If you read the comments you might understand. I am not crying. I am not blogging. It is the only way I can secure that these r not removed. I have had 400 dls in other posts. My nephews are being hurt. my emails an blogs are being blocked.
thx for the faggot comment buts your comments in perspective, I have already been told to kill myself to. nice world?
.my router has just been completely disconnected...again I have DOS attacks..whenever I try to seed legal torrents on TPB...and only when I access TPB..I see the sources in my router.

And again...my irradict writing is more caused by my injury's my Blog is on Blogpspot under this tag...its not much better...I am no posting also on Word Press.
I have NOTHING in this for myself.
I just do not want to believe that a country I once believed in is bad enough to still protect these people..my ten year old brother  cracked my head open and ripped the left side of my mouth open...And I am not crying. I am trying to protect others who are important to me...and I gain nothing in it at all.
TPB has been extremely nice to me in this. I have not contacted them personally, but they have left these here. And in that you have no idea how grateful I am to them.
